page.title: 02The P.P.F. Factory
page.content: One boy was able to ask his father about working at the factory. They work to produce food flavours and toothpaste mainly. The factory staff wear white overalls and strong shoes. They use sulphuric acid at times. Ten people work together on each of two shifts per day, seven days a week. The workers have five weeks annual holiday. The boy's father goes to work on a bicycle although many people travel by car. The factory has recently been built on open, flat land with easy access to the motorway.
